title: 迪迪尼樂園罷工潮，部份設施受影響。

replies.msg:
老鼠樂園好多演藝人員射波，好多設施受影響，部份演出甚至取消。
-Moana cancelled
-Lion King first show remain normal, but limited show technique
-MWB cancelled
-Parade 50/50 cancel
-overnight shuttle will base on update situation
-SW closed
-space mountain/orbitron may close at 1900, TBC
-JRC/raft closed
-TGM GG/MM close whole day
-Ironman/command post normal operations
-MSCC/SD/RBH/TT open
-EC/CFF/CMC closed
-starbucks may Close at 1500
-1615 Eddy and senior pls join City hall magic conference room

但.......工會搞的罷工集會就小貓三四隻..........
